'''''Der Freischütz''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Marksmanship]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to strike an opponent's weak point from extremely far away with an [[Charged Attack#Aimed Shots|Aimed Shot]].

==Trivia==
* Named after the opera "{{w|Der Freischütz}}."
